name: Bomber Arena
description: Bomber Arena is a 3d action adventure game where you go through several mazes in solo mode or co-op (only local) fighting enemies until you reach your goal. You can take powers to improve your character as well as mounts to help you defeat your opponents in this game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM Storage: 250 MB available space
